name: SpeakersJS
tagline: A place for speakers, prospective speakers, mentors, and members of the community to ideate and collaborate on Javascript talks
body:
## Organization

We'll open a repository for each conference or meetup group. That should help speakers connect with the communities they want to address.

### [NationJS 2015](https://github.com/speakersjs/nationjs-2015)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
